title: Akaliza Keza Ntwari writes on women-led innovation - Fondation Botnar

quotes: This year in Vancouver, Canada, activists, advocates, and decision makers from around the world united to bring an international focus on gender equality to Women Deliver.

organizations.name: Women Deliver
quotes: For Women Deliver 2019 that took place in Vancouver, Canada, Akaliza spotlighted five tech solutions that show the potential of women-led innovation to better the health of women and girls.

organizations.name: World Health Organization (WHO)
quotes: The World Health Organization (WHO) published that approximately 830 women die every single day due to mostly preventable pregnancy and childbirth related issues – 99% of these women living in low- and middle-income countries.

quotes: UN Women highlighting the disproportionate impact that environmental issues have on women and children.
